reviewText: i'm a sucker for christmas dvd's.  this qualifies, but is somewhat redundant, which pushes the bordelines of boredom.  that being said, it's got some traditional christmas tunes and a few interesting scenes.  i guess the square footage of this village is seriously limited, since they keep showing the same views repeatedly.  a little more scenery would have rated a few more christmas stars.  still, it is a christmas dvd.
